name: Google Search
description: Google Search offers an 'AI Mode' that provides personalized suggestions and insights based on user interests and trending topics. It also includes features like 'I'm Feeling Curious' and other playful prompts to encourage exploration. The page also highlights Google devices and AI applications in science and the environment.

core: Personalized content based on user interests
Information on Google devices and AI initiatives
Links to Google's advertising and business services

pros: Provides a more engaging and personalized search experience
Encourages discovery of new information and topics
Offers a glimpse into Google's AI advancements and product lineup
Easy access to core Google services and information
cons: AI mode can sometimes produce inappropriate predictions.
Limited customization options for AI mode.
useCases: Learning about Google products and AI
